name: Bounty: Drag Racing
description:
Bounty: Drag Racing is the most complete drag racing experience on the market. Race the fastest and most varied types of dragsters in the world.
Fine tune your cars to achieve maximum performance and get online for the most competitive drag racing encounters.

*Work your way up the ladder starting from motorbike-engine dragsters up to 5 second Doorslammers
*True to life staging system
*Featuring 4 Cylinder, 6 Cylinder, 8 Cylinder, 2 rotor, 3 rotor, and diesel engines
*Weather System that affects car handling
*Monthly Competitive Events
*Detailed interiors and engines
*More cars and features to come
